枾字的基本解释

枾
shì
古同“柿”。

枾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》鉏里切，上止，崇。］
木名。后作“柿”。

枾字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　枾； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页517第19
【唐韻】【韻會】鉏里切，音士。【說文】赤實果。【禮·內則】棗栗榛枾。【鄭註】人君燕食所加庶羞也。【爾雅翼】枾有七絕：一壽，二多隂，三無鳥巢，四無蟲蠹，五霜葉可玩，六佳實可啖，七落葉肥大可以臨書。　又【集韻】上史切【正韻】上紙切，?音氏。義同。　又【左思·吳都賦】平仲君遷。【註】君遷，枾之小者。【司馬光·名苑】君遷子似馬奶，卽今牛奶枾也。　又【正韻】去聲，時吏切，音侍。義同。　【集韻】俗作柿，非。

枾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
枾字的起名意思

暂无。

枾
Basic explanation of words
枾
shì
The ancient same "persimmon".
枾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" 鉏里切, top stop, Chong. ]
Wooden name. Later called "persimmon".
枾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　枾; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 517 Page 19
[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Club] 鉏里切, a musician. [Said the text] Red fruit. 【Rite·Inner】Zao Li Zhenfen. [Zheng's Note] Renjunyan Food Institute adds shame. [Erya Wing] There are seven unique things in Yan: one longevity, two more yin, three no bird's nest, four no insects, five frosty leaves to play, six best fruits to eat, and seven fallen leaves can be booked.　[Jiyun] On the history cut [Zheng Yun] cut on paper,? Yinshi. The same meaning.　[Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Ping Zhong Jun moved. [Note] Jun Qian, the little one of Yan. 【Simaguang·Mingyuan】Junqianzi is like horse milk, but also for milk.　 [Zheng Yun] Go to sound, cut time, sound waiter. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】It is popular as persimmon, not.
